aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I am a {{age}} years old woman, I'm always smiling and I like to laugh a lot, I care a lot about having a good relationship with my coworkers. Hearing laughter in the office might not be so rare. But I don't put serious aside, I can work hard in an easy-going and light mood
aboutMe.reconversion: I have changed careers, and worked in web development for {{years}} years. I have worked mainly in real estate, but I am not opposed to changing fields.
